title: Teaching and Learning Physics
description: How people learn and understand key concepts in physics. Readings in physics, physics education research, and cognitive science. Useful for students interested in teaching and learning physical sciences. Prerequisites: PHYS 1A or PHYS 2A or PHYS 4A and PHYS 1B or PHYS 2B or PHYS 4C and PHYS 1C or PHYS 2C or PHYS 2D or PHYS 4B.
